abstract: Federal Judge Bernard A Friedman strikes down Michigan’s ban on same-sex marriage; decision is latest in string of court decisions across the country to rule that denying marriage to gay and lesbian couples is a violation of the Constitution.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge issued the latest in a string of rulings that say it is unconstitutional to deny marriage to gay couples.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Federal Judge Strikes Down Michigan’s Ban on Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Strikes Down Michigan’s Ban on Same-Sex Marriage

snippet: A federal judge issued the latest in a string of rulings that say it is unconstitutional to deny marriage to gay couples....
